attributes.additional_details:
Jediism was once one of the largest religions in all of the UK, surpassing  Judaism, Sikhism and Buddhism.
Praising the awareness of self ability and senses the religion is yet to be adopted as a legitimate religion despite several successful seminars and official doctrines.
We do not ask much, however we want the UK to realise we are a legitimate religion.

Adding titles to the beginning of names is a simple and somewhat blanked part of our society, we should allow followers to have the option to have:
Padawan
Higher followers of the religion who stand out in our church will be allowed the title:
Jedi Knight
And the ministers should be allowed the title:
Jedi Master
